translation:
Piratini, October 18, 1838.

Most Illustrious Sir,

The government orders that Your Excellency São João, the citizen Manuel da Silva Pacheco, ascertain whether the effects seized from the sloop “Mineira” exist at the Mendonça ford or in the warehouses of D. Antônia, at Barra de Camaquã, so that the carts sent from here with the purpose of transporting such effects may go directly to the place of receipt of the cargo; and this can be done immediately by Your Excellency Francisco Antônio Machado, who today leaves here with carts for the conveyance of the said effects.

God keep Your Excellency,

Domingos José de Almeida
